oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Present pageant at Eastland, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the Founders’ Day pageant at Eastland School. The caption identifies left to right “Mrs. Tom A. Bland, president of the Eastland P.T.A.; Mrs. J. H. Pate, Eastland Founders’ Day chairman; Mrs. B. L. Webb, Mrs. R. S. Burgess, Mrs. Douglas Odom, Miss Gertrude Smith, Mrs. J. M. Chilton, and Mrs. J. P. Seay.” The 1938 City Directory cites the address for the school at 1501-05 Douglas Avenue East. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Eastland School (Nashville, Tennessee)
